definitions.definition: A former country in Southeast Europe in the Balkans , now split into 6 countries: Bosnia and Herzegovina , Croatia , North Macedonia , Montenegro , Serbia , and Slovenia .

subdefinitions.definition: The Kingdom of Yugoslavia , a kingdom ruled by the House of Karađorđević which existed from 1918 to 1941.
The Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia , a communist state which existed from 1945 to 1992.

definitions.definition: A former country in Southeast Europe , a rump state formed by Serbia and Montenegro after 1992; in full, Federal Republic of Yugoslavia .

subdefinitions.definition: Serbia and Montenegro , after 2003 until 2006, when it disintegrated.

main_definition: ( historical ) A former country in Southeast Europe in the Balkans , now split into 6 countries: Bosnia and Herzegovina , Croatia , North Macedonia , Montenegro , Serbia , and Slovenia .
secondary_definitions: ( historical ) A former country in Southeast Europe , a rump state formed by Serbia and Montenegro after 1992; in full, Federal Republic of Yugoslavia .
